byline.original: By MUJIB MASHAL and ZAHRA NADER

lead_paragraph: The world body launched an appeal Saturday for more than half a billion dollars to help civilians feeling the brunt of an intensifying war.
snippet: The world body launched an appeal Saturday for more than half a billion dollars to help civilians feeling the brunt of an intensifying war....

headline.main: A Third of Afghans Will Need Aid This Year, U.N. Says
headline.print_headline: A Third of Afghans Will Need Aid This Year, U.N. Says
